name: RangeExpression
desc: A type that can be used to slice a collection.

items.name: associatedtype Bound
items.desc: The type for which the expression describes a range.

items.name: func contains(Self.Bound) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the given element is contained within the range expression.

items.name: func relative<C>(to: C) -> Range<Self.Bound>
items.desc: Returns the range of indices described by this range expression within the given collection.

items.name: static func ~= (Self, Self.Bound) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether a value is included in a range.
